name: Love All You Have Left
description: After her daughter is killed in a school shooting, Juliette discovers a girl in her attic who claims to be Anne Frank.

review.author: Viknesh_Silvalingam
review.heading: A unique and interesting premise
review.reviewBody: Independent films have the ability to tell unique stories that studio films would rather not touch. This film definitely has that going for it. Tight storytelling as you can tell with the run time shows confidence in the story rather than leathering it with unnecessary minutes. Give this film a chance if you are looking for original storytelling.

keywords: school,alternate history,b movie,coming of age,experimental film
